    • readCell

      ReducedCell readCell​(ReducedBoard board, java.lang.String prompt)

      Parameters:

      prompt - the prompt to show when asking for input
      Returns:
      the selected ReducedCell

    • readCell

    • getLine

      private java.lang.String getLine()
      Reads a line from the input. If an input file was specified for input, the file is used as input source until its end is reached, then the input is moved to stdin. If reading from file, the special value %TIMESTAMP% is replaced with the current timestamp.
      Returns:
      the read line

    • printReadPrompt

      Parameters:

      def - the default value, suggested to the user
      expected_input_length - the expected input length
